00026 INT16 gbSmoothStruct[] = 
00027 
00028 {
00029             3, 2, 12, 27, 12, 0,
00030             5, 2, 15, 30, 39, 0, 
00031             7, 2, 17, 32, 41, 0,
00032        11, 2, 14, 29, 14, 0,
00033             8, 2, 13, 28, 38, 0,
00034    15, 1, 19,  0, 43, 0,
00035        26, 1, 20,  0, 44, 0,
00036        12, 2, 18, 33, 42, 0,
00037        23, 1, 21,  0, 45, 0,
00038        18, 2, 16, 31, 40, 0,
00039        21, 1, 22,  0, 46, 0,
00040        14, 2, 11, 26, 11, 0,
00041        19, 1, 23,  0, 47, 0,
00042        16, 2, 24, 34, 48, 0,
00043        10, 2, 25, 35, 49, 0,
00044    -1
00045 };
00046        
00047 // This is a list of smoothed out water/shoreline textures
00048 // Coding is as such:
00049 // 1st - the corresponding bitvalue for the surrounding water tiles
00050 // 2nd - the number of variations to randomize terrain
00051 // 3rd - the first variation
00052 // 4th - the second variation
00053 
00054 INT16 gbSmoothWaterStruct[] = 
00055 // FIRST                ENTRY             MAJIC NUMBER CALCULATED
00056 // 2nd                        ENTRY             # OF VARIATIONS
00057 // 3rd, 4rth  ENTRY                 TILE NUMBERS ( entry 1, entry 2 )               
00058 {
00059         1020, 1, 11, 0,
00060       1000, 1, 12, 0,
00061             510, 2, 13, 43,
00062             190, 1, 14, 0,
00063             894, 1, 15, 0,
00064             622, 1, 16, 0, 
00065         1014, 2, 17, 41,
00066     944, 1, 18, 24,
00067     872, 1, 19, 0,
00068     992, 1, 20, 0,
00069             62, 1, 21, 0,
00070             190, 2, 22, 14,
00071             620, 1, 23, 0,
00072             944, 1, 24, 18,
00073             878, 2, 25, 32,
00074             434, 1, 28, 0,
00075             110, 1, 29,0,
00076             1010, 1, 30,0,
00077             876, 2, 31, 32, 
00078             878, 2, 32, 31,
00079     1004, 2, 32, 31,
00080             1006, 2, 33, 34,
00081             1008, 2, 34, 33,
00082             1016, 2, 33, 34,
00083             126, 2, 35, 36,
00084             254, 2, 35, 26, 
00085             638, 2, 36, 26, 
00086             438, 2, 38, 27,
00087             446, 2, 37, 38,
00088             950, 2, 37, 27,
00089             864, 1, 39, 0,
00090             1040, 1, 40, 0, 
00091             1014, 2, 41, 17,
00092             432, 1, 42, 0,
00093             510, 1, 43, 13,
00094             54, 1, 44, 0,
00095     108, 1, 45, 0,
00096             -1

00102 void SmoothTerrain(int gridno, int origType, UINT16 *piNewTile, BOOLEAN fForceSmooth )
00103 {
00104       int temp=0,type=0;
00105       int FullTile = FALSE;
00106       UINT16 usOldIndex;
00107       UINT16 usTempIndex;
00108       UINT32 cnt;
00109       BOOLEAN fFound;
00110       UINT32      uiTempIndex;
00111       UINT16  usTileIndex;
00112       UINT16      land=0;
00113       UINT32  uiTopType;
00114       BOOLEAN     fSameTile;
00115 
00116       INT16       *pSmoothStruct;
00117   // Check to see if the orginal texture was water, is so, smooth square/hex with 
00118       // SmoothWaterTerrain rather than the proceeding method
00119       if( origType==REGWATERTEXTURE)
00120       {
00121     SmoothWaterTerrain( gridno, origType, piNewTile, TRUE);
00122             return;
00123       }
00124       pSmoothStruct = gbSmoothStruct;
00125 
00126       // Get land index value for given level and adjust according to type
00127       if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( gridno, origType, &usTileIndex ) )
00128       {
00129             GetTypeSubIndexFromTileIndex( origType, usTileIndex, &usOldIndex );
00130       }
00131       else
00132       {
00133             *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00134             return;
00135       }
00136 
00137       // Check if we're dealing with a 'full' tile ( first ten )
00138       // If so, do not smooth
00139       // Onlt do if we are not forcing the smooth
00140       if ( !fForceSmooth )
00141       {
00142             if ( usOldIndex >= 1 && usOldIndex <= 10 )
00143             {
00144                   *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00145                   return;           
00146             }
00147       }
00148 
00149       // is land height one tile above not the same type?
00150       if ( (gridno- WORLD_COLS ) >= 0 )
00151       {
00152             if ( !TypeExistsInLandLayer( gridno - WORLD_COLS, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00153             {
00154                   // no it's not
00155                   temp+=3;
00156             }
00157       }
00158       // is land height one tile to the right not the same type?
00159       // (make sure there IS a tile to the right, i.e. check for border)
00160       if ((gridno+1)% WORLD_COLS !=0)
00161       {
00162             if ( !TypeExistsInLandLayer( gridno+1, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00163             {
00164                   // no it's not
00165                   temp+=5;
00166             }
00167       }
00168 
00169       // is land height one tile down not the same type?
00170       if ( (gridno + WORLD_COLS ) < ( WORLD_COLS * WORLD_ROWS ) )
00171       {
00172             if ( !TypeExistsInLandLayer( gridno + WORLD_COLS, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00173             {
00174                   // no it's not
00175                   temp+=7;
00176             }
00177       }
00178 
00179       // is land height one tile to left not the same type?
00180       if (gridno % WORLD_COLS!=0)
00181       {
00182             if ( !TypeExistsInLandLayer( gridno-1, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00183             {
00184                   // no it's not
00185                   temp+=11;
00186             }
00187       }
00188 
00189       // Now, at this point the height (of "temp") will tell us
00190       // which texture piece to use
00191       
00192       // Loop through smooth struct
00193       cnt = 0;
00194       fFound = FALSE;
00195 
00196       GetLandHeadType( gridno, &uiTopType );
00197 
00198       while( pSmoothStruct[ cnt ] != -1 )
00199       {
00200             if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt ] == temp )
00201             {
00202                   fSameTile = FALSE;
00203                   // If water is it's top type
00204                   do
00205                   {
00206                         // CHeck if it's the same tile
00207                         if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 2 ] == usOldIndex )
00208                         {
00209                                     fSameTile = TRUE;
00210                         }
00211                         if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 3 ] )
00212                         {
00213                                if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 3 ] == usOldIndex  )
00214                                {
00215                                           fSameTile = TRUE;
00216                                }
00217                         }
00218                         if ( fSameTile )
00219                         {
00220                               *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00221                               return;
00222                         }
00223                         uiTempIndex = rand() % pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 1 ];
00224                         land = pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 2 + uiTempIndex ]; 
00225                         fFound = TRUE;
00226                   } while( FALSE );
00227                   break;
00228             }
00229             cnt += 6;
00230       };
00231       if ( !fFound )
00232       {
00233             // Check for existance of same tile
00234             if ( usOldIndex >= 1 && usOldIndex <= 10 )
00235             {
00236                   *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00237                   return;
00238             }
00239             // this is a "full" tile, so randomize between the 
00240             // five available tiles
00241             land = (rand( ) % 10 ) + 1;
00242             FullTile = TRUE;
00243       }
00244       GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( origType, land, &usTileIndex );
00245       *piNewTile = usTileIndex;
00246 } 
00247 
00248 void SmoothExitGridRadius( INT16 sMapIndex, UINT8 ubRadius )
00249 {
00250       LEVELNODE* pShadow;
00251       INT16 x, y;
00252       INT16 centerX, centerY;
00253 
00254       ConvertGridNoToXY( sMapIndex, &centerX, &centerY );
00255 
00256       for( y = centerY - ubRadius; y <= centerY + ubRadius; y++ )
00257       {
00258             for( x = centerX - ubRadius; x <= centerX + ubRadius; x++ )
00259             {
00260                   sMapIndex = y * WORLD_COLS + x;
00261                   if( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sMapIndex ) )
00262                   {
00263                         if( GetExitGridLevelNode( sMapIndex, &pShadow ) )
00264                         {
00265                               UINT16 usIndex;
00266                               SmoothExitGrid( sMapIndex, &usIndex, TRUE );
00267                               if( usIndex != NO_TILE && usIndex != pShadow->usIndex )
00268                               {
00269                                     AddToUndoList( sMapIndex );
00270                                     pShadow->usIndex = usIndex;
00271                               }
00272                         }
00273                   }
00274             }
00275       }
00276 }
00277 
00278 void SmoothExitGrid(int gridno, UINT16 *piNewTile, BOOLEAN fForceSmooth )
00279 {
00280       int temp=0,type=0;

00292

00310       {

00317

00322             {
00323                   // no it's not
00324                   temp+=3;
00325             }

00350       {

00352             {
00353                   // no it's not

00355             }
00356       }

00358       // Now, at this point the height (of "temp") will tell us
00359       // which texture piece to use

00361       // Loop through smooth struct
00362       cnt = 0;
00363       fFound = FALSE;
00364

00372                   {

00374                         if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 2 ] == usOldIndex )
00375                         {
00376                                     fSameTile = TRUE;
00377                         }
00378                         if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 3 ] )
00379                         {
00380                                if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 3 ] == usOldIndex  )
00381                                {
00382                                           fSameTile = TRUE;
00383                                }
00384                         }

00387                               *piNewTile = NO_TILE;

00393                   } while( FALSE );
00394                   break;
00395             }
00396             cnt += 6;
00397       };
00398       if ( !fFound )
00399       {
00400             // Check for existance of same tile
00401             if ( usOldIndex >= 1 && usOldIndex <= 10 )
00402             {
00403                   *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00404                   return;
00405             }
00406             // this is a "full" tile, so randomize between the 
00407             // five available tiles
00408             usExitGridIndex = (rand( ) % 10 ) + 1;
00409             FullTile = TRUE;
00410       }
00411       GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( EXITTEXTURE, usExitGridIndex, &usTileIndex );
00412       *piNewTile = usTileIndex;
00413 } 
00414 
00415 void SmoothTerrainWorld( UINT32 uiCheckType )
00416 {
00417        int                                cnt;
00418        UINT16                             usIndex;
00419        UINT16                             NewTile;
00420        // Smooth out entire world surrounding tiles
00421        for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
00422        {
00423                   if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( cnt, uiCheckType, &usIndex ) )
00424                   {
00425                         SmoothTerrain( cnt, uiCheckType, &NewTile, TRUE );
00426 
00427                     if ( NewTile != NO_TILE )
00428                     {
00429                                // Change tile
00430                                SetLandIndex( cnt, NewTile, uiCheckType, FALSE );
00431                     }
00432                   }
00433        }
00434 }
00435 
00436 
00437 void SmoothAllTerrainWorld( void )
00438 {
00439       int                                 cnt;
00440       UINT16                        usIndex;
00441       UINT16                        NewTile;
00442       UINT32                        uiCheckType;
00443        // Smooth out entire world surrounding tiles
00444       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
00445       {
00446             for ( uiCheckType = FIRSTTEXTURE; uiCheckType <= SEVENTHTEXTURE; uiCheckType++ )
00447             {
00448                   if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( cnt, uiCheckType, &usIndex ) )
00449                   {
00450                         SmoothTerrain( cnt, uiCheckType, &NewTile, TRUE );
00451 
00452                         if ( NewTile != NO_TILE )
00453                         {
00454                                // Change tile
00455                                SetLandIndex( cnt, NewTile, uiCheckType, FALSE );
00456                         }
00457                   }
00458             }
00459       }
00460 }
00461 
00462 void SmoothTerrainRadius( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT32 uiCheckType, UINT8 ubRadius, BOOLEAN fForceSmooth )
00463 {
00464       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00465       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00466       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00467       INT32                       iNewIndex;
00468       UINT16                              NewTile;
00469       UINT16                              usIndex;
00470       INT32                         leftmost;
00471       // Don't bother to smooth floors, they don't need them
00472       if ( uiCheckType >= FIRSTFLOOR && uiCheckType <= LASTFLOOR )      
00473             return;
00474       // Determine start end end indicies and num rows
00475       sTop        = ubRadius;
00476       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00477       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00478       sRight  = ubRadius;
00479       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00480       {
00481             leftmost = ( ( iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00482             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00483             {
00484                   iNewIndex = iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00485                   if ( iNewIndex >=0 && iNewIndex < WORLD_MAX && 
00486                            iNewIndex >= leftmost && iNewIndex < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00487                   {
00488                         if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( iNewIndex, uiCheckType, &usIndex ) )
00489                         {
00490                                     SmoothTerrain(  iNewIndex, uiCheckType, &NewTile, fForceSmooth );
00491 
00492                               if ( NewTile != NO_TILE )
00493                           {
00494                                      // Change tile
00495                                      AddToUndoList( iNewIndex );
00496                                      SetLandIndex( iNewIndex, NewTile, uiCheckType, FALSE );
00497                               }
00498                         }
00499                   }
00500             }
00501       }
00502 }
00503 
00504 void SmoothAllTerrainTypeRadius( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT8 ubRadius, BOOLEAN fForceSmooth )
00505 {
00506       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00507       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00508       INT16  cnt1, cnt2, cnt3;
00509       INT32                       iNewIndex;
00510       UINT16                              NewTile;
00511       UINT16                              usIndex;
00512       INT32                         leftmost;
00513       // Determine start end end indicies and num rows
00514       sTop        = ubRadius;
00515       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00516       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00517       sRight  = ubRadius;
00518       for( cnt3 = FIRSTTEXTURE; cnt3 <= SEVENTHTEXTURE; cnt3++ )
00519       {
00520             for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00521             {
00522                   leftmost = ( ( iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00523                   for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00524                   {
00525                         iNewIndex = iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00526                         if ( iNewIndex >=0 && iNewIndex < WORLD_MAX && 
00527                                      iNewIndex >= leftmost && iNewIndex < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00528                         {
00529                               if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( iNewIndex, cnt3, &usIndex ) )
00530                               {
00531                                     SmoothTerrain(  iNewIndex, cnt3, &NewTile, fForceSmooth );
00532                                     if ( NewTile != NO_TILE )
00533                                     {
00534                                            // Change tile
00535                                            SetLandIndex( iNewIndex, NewTile, cnt3, FALSE );
00536                                     }
00537                               }
00538                         }
00539                   }
00540             }
00541       }
00542 }
00543 
00544 void SmoothWaterTerrain( int gridno, int origType, UINT16 *piNewTile, BOOLEAN fForceSmooth )
00545 {
00546       // This procedure will calculate the approriate smooth texture for a water texture
00547       // based on the surrounding water textures. This is done via masking bits within 
00548       // a temp variable, then searching for the right texture and inserting it
00549       int temp=0,type=0;
00550       int FullTile = FALSE;
00551       UINT16 usOldIndex;
00552       UINT16 usTempIndex;
00553       UINT32 cnt;
00554       BOOLEAN fFound;
00555       UINT32      uiTempIndex;
00556       UINT16  usTileIndex;
00557       UINT16      land=0;
00558       UINT32  uiTopType;
00559       BOOLEAN     fSameTile;
00560       INT16       *pSmoothStruct;
00561 
00562       pSmoothStruct = gbSmoothWaterStruct;
00563       // Get land index value for given level and adjust according to type
00564       if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( gridno, origType, &usTileIndex ) )
00565       {
00566             GetTypeSubIndexFromTileIndex( origType, usTileIndex, &usOldIndex );
00567       }
00568       else
00569       {
00570             *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00571             return;
00572       }
00573       // Check if we're dealing with a 'full' tile ( first ten )
00574       // If so, do not smooth
00575       // Onlt do if we are not forcing the smooth
00576       if ( !fForceSmooth )
00577       {
00578             if ( usOldIndex >= 1 && usOldIndex <= 10 )
00579             {
00580                   *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00581                   return;           
00582             }
00583       }
00584       // Mask approriate bits in temp for the lookup in the SmoothWaterStruct list
00585       if ( (gridno- WORLD_COLS ) >= 0 )
00586       {
00587             if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno - WORLD_COLS, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00588             {
00589                   // no it's not
00590                   temp|=4;
00591             }
00592       }
00593       // is land height one tile to the right not the same type?
00594       // (make sure there IS a tile to the right, i.e. check for border)
00595       if ((gridno+1)% WORLD_COLS !=0)
00596       {
00597             if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno + 1, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00598             {
00599                   // no it's not
00600                   temp|=64;
00601             }
00602       }
00603       // is land height one tile down not the same type?
00604       if ( (gridno + WORLD_COLS ) < ( WORLD_COLS * WORLD_ROWS ) )
00605       {
00606             if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno + WORLD_COLS, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00607             {
00608                   // no it's not
00609                   temp|=256;
00610             }
00611       }
00612       // is land height one tile to left not the same type?
00613       if (gridno % WORLD_COLS!=0)
00614       {
00615             if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno - 1, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00616             {
00617                   // no it's not
00618                   temp|=16;
00619             }
00620       }
00621       if ((gridno+1)% WORLD_COLS !=0)
00622       {
00623 
00624             if ( (gridno- WORLD_COLS ) >= 0 )
00625             {
00626                   if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno - WORLD_COLS + 1, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00627                   {
00628                         // no it's not
00629                         temp|=8;
00630                   }
00631             }
00632       }
00633       if (gridno % WORLD_COLS!=0)
00634       {
00635             if ( (gridno- WORLD_COLS ) >= 0 )
00636             {
00637                   if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno - WORLD_COLS - 1, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00638                   {
00639                         // no it's not
00640                         temp|=2;
00641                   }
00642             }
00643       }
00644       if ((gridno+1)% WORLD_COLS !=0)
00645       {
00646             if ( (gridno + WORLD_COLS ) < ( WORLD_COLS * WORLD_ROWS ) )
00647             {
00648                   if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno + WORLD_COLS + 1, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00649                   {
00650                         // no it's not
00651                         temp|=512;
00652                   }
00653             }
00654       }
00655       if (gridno % WORLD_COLS!=0)
00656       {
00657             if ( (gridno + WORLD_COLS ) < ( WORLD_COLS * WORLD_ROWS ) )
00658             {
00659 
00660                   if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno + WORLD_COLS - 1, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00661                   {
00662                         // no it's not
00663                         temp|=128;
00664                   }
00665             }
00666       }
00667       if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( gridno, origType, origType, &usTempIndex ) )
00668       {
00669             // no it's not
00670             temp|=32;
00671       }
00672       // Loop through smooth struct
00673       cnt = 0;
00674       fFound = FALSE;
00675       GetLandHeadType( gridno, &uiTopType );
00676       // Speed up of this while loop  using double/quick search will result 
00677       // in an incorrect solution due to multiple instances of bitvalues in the list of 
00678       // smoothed water textures
00679       while( pSmoothStruct[ cnt ] != -1 )
00680       {
00681             if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt ] == temp )
00682             {
00683                   fSameTile = FALSE;
00684                   do
00685                   {
00686                         // CHeck if it's the same tile
00687                         if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 2 ] == usOldIndex )
00688                         {
00689                                     fSameTile = TRUE;
00690                         }
00691                         if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 3 ] )
00692                         {
00693                                if ( pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 3 ] == usOldIndex  )
00694                                {
00695                                           fSameTile = TRUE;
00696                                }
00697                         }
00698                         if ( fSameTile )
00699                         {
00700                               *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00701                               return;
00702                         }
00703                         uiTempIndex = rand() % pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 1 ];
00704                         land = pSmoothStruct[ cnt + 2 + uiTempIndex ]; 
00705                         fFound = TRUE;
00706                   } while( FALSE );
00707                   break;
00708             }
00709             cnt += 4;
00710       };
00711       if ( !fFound )
00712       {
00713                   // Check for existance of same tile
00714               if ( usOldIndex >= 1 && usOldIndex <= 10 )
00715                   {
00716                         *piNewTile = NO_TILE;
00717                         return;
00718                   }
00719                   land = (rand( ) % 10 ) + 1;
00720                   FullTile = TRUE;
00721       }
00722       GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( origType, land, &usTileIndex );
00723       *piNewTile = usTileIndex;
00724 } 
00725 
00726 
00727 #endif
